definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]

pinyin: Sheng4 Pi2 ai1 er3 he2 Mi4 ke4 long2
Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1

sentences.english: And Pierre began to have the same feeling towards Karataev.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃爾也開始對卡拉塔耶夫抱着同樣的感情。

sentences.english: In the most serious frame of mind Pierre drove up to the old prince's house.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃爾懷着極其嚴肅的心情乘車去老公爵家。

sentences.english: I'll be mixing it up with Francis LaPierre.
sentences.chinese: 我會和弗朗西斯拉皮埃爾一起過的。

sentences.english: On the way he was told of the death of his brother-in-law, Anatole, and of the death of Prince Andrey.
sentences.chinese: 在路上，皮埃爾得知他的內兄和安德烈公爵的死訊。

sentences.english: The home of Mathilde and Pierre(P)Loisel, ten years before.
sentences.chinese: 十年前，瑪蒂爾德和皮埃爾的家。

sentences.english: Pierre went out into the yard, and muffling his head up, lay down in his carriage.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃爾穿過院子，蒙着頭在自己馬車裏躺下睡覺。

sentences.english: Every day Pierre went into things with the head steward.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃爾和總管事人每天都要研究業務。

sentences.english: Pierre listened to the colonel's remarks, and nodded his head approvingly .
sentences.chinese: 皮埃爾諦聽上校說話，點點頭，表示贊同。

sentences.english: Pierre stood up to help the servant.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃爾站立起來，幫助這個僕人。

sentences.english: The old prince came in to supper; it was obviously on Pierre's account.
sentences.chinese: 老公爵出來喫夜飯，顯然是爲了招待皮埃爾的緣故。

sentences.english: However, the experts do not find Pierre blameless.
sentences.chinese: 然而，專家們並不認爲皮埃爾是無罪的。

sentences.english: In 1906, however, Pierre, who was crossing a road, was run over and killed. (who… ≈ when he…)
sentences.chinese: 1906年，皮埃爾在橫穿馬路時被車壓死了。

sentences.english: She is interred at the cemetery in Sceaux, alongside her husband Pierre.
sentences.chinese: 她被埋在索鎮公墓，靠着她的丈夫皮埃爾。

sentences.english: "It may be, " said Pierre, looking absentmindedly about him.
sentences.chinese: “可能，”皮埃爾說，沮喪地看了看周圍。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
